name: How to put 3D models in TyranoBuilder
name_original: How to put 3D models in TyranoBuilder
description:
A tutorial demonstrating how to display 3D models in TyranoBuilder.

The PDF teaches you step by step how you should proceed to implement the 3D models in your game.

Utilized software:

  • TyranoBuilder
  • Three.js

You can download the full source code of this tutorial by clicking "Download Now".
